MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich affecting properties in Beswick Road, Bluebell Close and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of severe flooding in the area which is currently preventing our engineers from being able to carry out repairs in safety. We now expect to have your supplies restored by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:59am on the 21st January 2021
